mosais.distribution

Class RandomPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • mosais.distribution.PlotTree
      • mosais.distribution.RandomPlot

  • public class RandomPlot
extends PlotTree
    A distribution of points that generates all points randomly without adjusting for density of distribution.
    Author:
    Andrew Trismen

      • RandomPlot

        public RandomPlot(int numPoints,
          int width,
          int height)
        Create a new random plot with the given number of points within the given dimensions.
        Parameters:
        numPoints - Number of points to generate for the plot.
        width - Width of the area in which to place points.
        height - Height of the area in which to place points.
